title: The.Quest.v1.6.1-Tenguken
description:
The Quest (c) Redshift

Release Date : 01/2016
Protection : Steam
Discs : 1
Game Version : 1.6.1
Genre : RPG, Adventure, indie
Languages : EN

The Quest is a beautifully hand-drawn open world role playing game with
old school grid-based movement and turn based combat. In the kingdom of
Monares trouble is brewing. The governor of Freymore is missing and
the island is in tumult. The mages all prophesy a dark shadow looming
over the safety of the kingdom. As an Agent of the king, it's your job
to find out what is happening and avert any danger.

1.Burn or mount
2.Install the game
3.Play the game

Update to version 1.6.1:

* Added option to sort spells, potions and quests alphabetically.
* Added the manual to the game.
* Added the original PC development version of the game.
It can be found in the "old-game" folder, in the game's install folder.
It's provided as is, for those who might be interested, with no support
